Content: I love the tingles app. It's my go to when my mainstream ASMRtists haven't posted on YouTube. The app is fantastic but I think the overall UI could use some fine tuning. For example looking at specific triggers, only 15 videos show up when I believe the whole archive should be showing. That may need a fixing. As well app crashes when Facebook is open. Weird but reoccurring. Otherwise awesome app!
It crashed once, but it is a new app. I love asmr and being able to listen in the background is worth it my friends. Give tingles another chance.
Great app but after update the app won't even open it just crashes instantly please help
My videos never buffer or freeze its better than watching ASMR on YouTube
This app was amazing...BUT now it crashes anytime I try and read a book. Also lots of popular ASMR-ist are not exsisting. I don't know what happend but this app is going down hill.
Has potential, but seems to freeze repeatedly.... Oh, it just froze again. I'm very close to giving up on it 😕

I used this app for a really long time, it was working great and it helped a lot until one update came and I started getting errors, I reinstalled the app several times and every time I went on my homepage it would give me random artist that I did not follow nor have I heard about, when I did unfollow the artist the app would crash and when I would re-open it it would say there was an error with loading data. Unfortunately I had to uninstall the app and change my rating as the app does not work anymore.
Very good, but often the video will stop after about 8 minutes and the app ask me to try again(crash?)
